prompt:
In a quiet Nigerian neighborhood, a retired superhero—now a broke, middle-aged man hiding in plain sight—gets an unexpected visitor: a child who has inherited his powers. The child begs him to train her, claiming that something dark is coming and only she can stop it.

The hero, haunted by a past mistake that cost lives, refuses. But when the child is abducted by a mysterious group trying to harvest her powers, he must confront his guilt, reclaim his strength, and rise for one last mission.
